hero.headline: A realtime whiteboard that feels effortless.
hero.subheadline: Create boards instantly. Share with a link. Collaborate with anyone in real time.
hero.microcopy: No signup needed. Works with guests. Open source.

whyThisExists.headline: Built for ideas that move fast.

howItWorks.headline: Real time without the overhead.
howItWorks.copy: Every board has its own state coordinator powered by Cloudflare Durable Objects. This gives Liva smooth consistency, replayable updates, and low cost scaling.
